metadata.name: Potential Dosfuscation Activity
metadata.comment: Detects possible payload obfuscation via the commandline

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('^^')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('^|^')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(',;,')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(';;;;')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(';; ;;')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('(,(,')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%comspec:~')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' c^m^d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('^c^m^d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' c^md')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' cm^d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('^cm^d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' s^et ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' s^e^t ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' se^t '))))

output.summary: Detects possible payload obfuscation via the commandline
